title: Shunned by the West, Russia and Myanmar Form a Partnership of Unequals
description: Myanmar gets resources and ammunition, while Russia gets a customer at a time when it is struggling for revenues. Each can use the other to undermine Western sanctions.
dc:creator: Sui-Lee Wee
media:credit: Nanna Heitmann for The New York Times
media:description: Myanmar fans and soldiers at the annual International Army Games in Russia in August. Myanmarâ€™s engagement with Russia has grown this year.
